message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can negotiate from here.
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not giving away too much yet. Your turn!
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 70% and you get 30%.  We can both do better than your last offer.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away the farm yet. Your turn again!
Let's split it 60/40 this time. It's a fair compromise, and we can both walk away with a decent amount. Time is running out!
I'm willing to make a slightly bigger concession, but I'm not going to give away too much more. Your turn again!
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable. We're both losing money with every round. Let's split it 50/50 and call it a day.
